at.fhhgb.mc.archivist.controller

Class ScoreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhhgb.mc.archivist.controller.ScoreController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/${api.path}/scores")
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:8000")
public class ScoreController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ScoreController makes score-entries accessible. URL: /archivist/api/scores

                path="/delete/{scoreIds}")
public void delete(@PathVariable

                               ScoreRepository repository,
                               java.lang.Integer scoreId)

        repository - the score repository

      • deleteScores

        public static void deleteScores(StorageService storageService,
                                ScoreRepository repository,
                                Musicpiece musicpiece)
        Deletes all scores of a given musicpiece. Deletes score entries from database and deletes the score files from the server.
        Parameters:
        storageService - the storage service
        repository - the score repository
        musicpiece - the musicpiece to delete the scores from
